text: Jean-Frédéric Poisson (born 22 January 1963 in Belfort) is the president of the Christian Democratic Party. In 2012, he was elected member of the National Assembly of France until 2017, representing the Yvelines departmenthttp://www.assemblee-nationale.fr/13/tribun/fiches_id/345937.asp. He got 1.5% of the vote in the 2016 centre-right primary, finishing sixth over seven candidates. He then announced his support for François Fillon. ==References== Category:1963 births Category:Living people Category:People from Belfort Category:Christian Democratic Party (France) politicians Category:Union for a Popular Movement politicians Category:Deputies of the 14th National Assembly of the French Fifth Republic
title: Jean-Frédéric Poisson
